messages.fastForwardEnabled: Step by step execution will be fast forwarded.
messages.fastForwardDisabled: Step by step execution is enabled.

ui.aboutProjectDesc: This is a Bloom Filter algorithm visualizer built using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It is designed to help users understand how the Bloom Filter data structure works through interactive simulations and visual representations.
ui.mightCrashMobile: This might crash your browser on mobile devices.
ui.greetAddItem: Add an item or check if an item is in the Bloom Filter using the buttons above.
ui.greetNavigation: You can use the 'Next' and 'Back' buttons to step through the process.
ui.greetFastForward: Use the 'Fast Forward' checkbox or the 'Finish' button to skip to the end of a process.
